[Learn more](../../integrations/using/about-adobe-id.md). Once Adobe Identity Management Service (IMS) is enabled for your organization, you can request provisioning of the [Experience Cloud Audience](https://experienceleague.adobe.com/en/docs/core-services/interface/services/audiences/overview){target="_blank"} integration with Campaign. To do that, send an email to [Digital-Request@adobe.com](mailto:Digital-Request@adobe.com) with the following information:
Request Type
 Configure Audience - Campaign Integration
Organization Name
 Your organization name
Organization ID
 Your Organization ID.
To find your organization ID, refer to this page
Environment
 Example: Production
Declared ID or Visitor ID
 Example: Declared ID
Additional Information
 Any useful information or comment that you may have
